Planets.name: Mercury
Planets.Fact: The closest planet to the Sun is only about as wide as the Atlantic Ocean!

Planets.name: Venus
Planets.Fact: Known as the evening or morning star. Yellow clouds made of sulfur and sulfuric acid cover the entire planet causing light to reflect off the surface

Planets.name: Mars
Planets.Fact: The largest peak on the red planet is a volcano called Olympus Mons，which is three times higher than Mount Everest!

Planets.name: Jupiter
Planets.Fact: The largest planet in the solar system.

Planets.name: Earth
Planets.Fact: It atmosphere protects us from meteoroids and radiation from the Sun.

Planets.name: Saturn
Planets.Fact: Saturn has more moons than any other planet and is known for its rings

Planets.name: Uranus
Planets.Fact: Orbits on its side，which means that its seasons are completely different to ours. Summer and winter each take 21 years at the north and south poles!

Planets.name: Neptune
Planets.Fact: It takes like more than 4 hours for light to reach Neptune from the Sun

Planets.name: Pluto
Planets.Fact: Declassified as a planet in 2006，but this remains controversial.
